page.title: 05WORK IN NORTH YATE
page.content: Most people in the area were about sixteen when they started work.Quite a lot of people work outside of the area,in Filton for example,and some travel all over country. Not many people are unemployed,but some women class themselves as 'housewives',and a few work as childminders.People are generally content with their jobs,and some like them a lot.Quite a large number are self-employed,and these seem to enjoy being their own boss. These include publicans,shopkeepers, garage owners, and builders. A few people have a university degree, and on the whole they work in Bristol. Quite a few of the women in the area had several changes of jobs before bringing up a family.
